thread.title: John Hartson

author: John Hartson
title: John Hartson
text:
First off took my course in NY with Greg , and he was an exceptional instructor..
Knowing zero about screen printing accept for what I watched on YouTube , I thought that it would be a good choice to take a course and learn the ins and outs of screen printing . Needless to say the course got me hooked and I will be buying equipment to start a little business, The course taught me what I need and don't and what is essential for the printing I wanna do.I Highly recommend !!! And OH it was fun too !!
